Serialized Form

  • Package model

    • Class model.Account

      class Account extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      4337015674464305540L

      • Serialized Fields

        • attemptsTotal
          int attemptsTotal
          Total number of hearts lost
        • bestScore
          long bestScore
          best performance score of the player of this account
        • brokenHeartsTotal
          int brokenHeartsTotal
          Total number of hearts lost
        • chosenPCsMap
          Map<Heroes,Integer> chosenPCsMap
          Map that associates the playable characters with the number in which they were chosen by player's account
        • completedStagesTotal
          int completedStagesTotal
          Total number of completed stage by this account
        • escapesTotal
          int escapesTotal
          Total number of used escapes
        • failuresTotal
          int failuresTotal
          Total number of accumulated failures
        • identifier
          long identifier
          Key used for equals and hash code. It is define by current time in which account is created.
        • matchesTotal
          int matchesTotal
          Total number of played matches
        • nickname
          String nickname
          Name choosen by the player
        • pauseTimeTotal
          int pauseTimeTotal
          Total pause time in seconds from every session of game
        • playTimeTotal
          int playTimeTotal
          Total playing time in seconds from every session of game
        • speedrunTime
          int speedrunTime
          Shortest time to complete a stage
        • victoriesTotal
          int victoriesTotal
          Total number of earned victories

    • Class view.DynaFrame

      class DynaFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      7110570838852888177L

      • Serialized Fields

        • accounts
          Set<Account> accounts
          Accounts List saved in the view
        • correctionFactor
          double correctionFactor
          Correction factor to perfectly position the invisible selection buttons above the panels option labels when switching from fullscreen to normal screen and vice versa.
        • currAccount
          Account currAccount
          Current account saved in the view
        • fullscreen
          boolean fullscreen
          True if frame is on fullscreen
        • height
          int height
          Current frame's height
        • master
          DynaMasterCard master
          Cardlayout's Master reference
        • requestAccountsToModel
          boolean requestAccountsToModel
          True if view asks to Model for updated accounts list
        • requestCurrAccountToModel
          boolean requestCurrAccountToModel
          True if view asks to Model for updated current account
        • selectedPC
          Heroes selectedPC
          User's chosen hero (to play)
        • selectedScene
          Theater.Scene selectedScene
          Selected Scene to start
        • selectedStage
          Theater.Stage selectedStage
          User's chosen Stage
        • standardHeight
          int standardHeight
          GUI standard Height
        • standardWidth
          int standardWidth
          GUI standard width
        • tenthHeight
          int tenthHeight
          Current tenth of frame's height
        • tenthWidth
          int tenthWidth
          Current tenth of frame's width
        • timeToPlay
          boolean timeToPlay
          True when User inserts all input so a new game session can starts.
        • width
          int width
          Current frame's width

    • Class view.DynaMasterCard

      class DynaMasterCard extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      3360726941883019303L

      • Serialized Fields

        • accountPanel
          DynaSlaveAccount accountPanel
          DynaSlaveAccount's reference in the Application.
        • activePanel
          String activePanel
          Name key of the current panel.
        • bSecond
          boolean bSecond
          True every second passed.
        • cardLayout
          CardLayout cardLayout
          I use CardLayout to manage Application panels.
        • createAccountPanel
          DynaSlaveAccountCreation createAccountPanel
          DynaSlaveAccountCreation's reference in the Application.
        • defScreen
          BufferedImage defScreen
          Each drawing is done on the defScreen. Then the defScreen will be drawn by the Master according to the real proportions of the DynaFrame.
        • drawDefaultBackground
          boolean drawDefaultBackground
          Decide if default background must be drawn.
        • drawOptions
          boolean drawOptions
          Decide if options must be drawn.
        • drawPointer
          boolean drawPointer
          Decide if arrow pointer must be drawn.
        • dynaFrame
          DynaFrame dynaFrame
          Reference to application frame.
        • enterPressedByMouse
          boolean enterPressedByMouse
          Check the clicked condition from the mouse
        • gamePanel
          DynaSlaveGame gamePanel
          DynaSlaveGame's reference in the Application.
        • manageAccountsPanel
          DynaSlaveAccountsManager manageAccountsPanel
          DynaSlaveAccountsManager's reference in the Application.
        • optionPanel
          DynaSlaveOption optionPanel
          DynaSlaveOption's reference in the Application.
        • panels
          Map<String,DynaSlaveCard> panels
          Map of String as keys and panels as values. In this map there are all the panels managed by the Master (and the Application).
        • playerPanel
          DynaSlavePlayer playerPanel
          DynaSlavePlayer's reference in the Application.
        • pointer
          int pointer
          The pointer indicates the position of the arrow visible on the screen. It's updated by notifications from Game Model.
        • stagePanel
          DynaSlaveStage stagePanel
          DynaSlaveStage's reference in the Application.
        • startPanel
          DynaSlaveStart startPanel
          DynaSlaveStart's reference in the Application.
        • statsAccountsPanel
          DynaSlaveAccountsStats statsAccountsPanel
          DynaSlaveAccountsStats's reference in the Application.
        • tempoForSecond
          long tempoForSecond
          Last registered timer value, updated every second.
        • time
          long time
          Time counter updated every bar passed. It's used by DynaSlavePlayer (that is an Animate type object).

    • Class view.DynaSlaveCard

      class DynaSlaveCard extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      9208793730768434390L

      • Serialized Fields

        • background
          BufferedImage background
          Panel background image
        • buttonHeight
          int buttonHeight
          standard button height
        • buttons
          List<JButton> buttons
          Panel buttons (they are invisible)
        • cl
          CardLayout cl
          Master's CardLayout reference
        • dimChar
          int dimChar
          standard char dimension
        • font
          Font font
          Special font for pencilPen method
        • master
          DynaMasterCard master
          CardLayout Master reference
        • meterH
          int meterH
          real height unit of the frame
        • meterW
          int meterW
          real width unit of the frame
        • modulus
          int modulus
          Total number of options in this card
        • options
          List<String> options
          Options Strings. They don't have specific X coordinates because they are centered on the screen.
        • posStandX
          List<Integer> posStandX
          X coordinates in defScreen of the invisible buttons
        • posStandY
          List<Integer> posStandY
          Y coordinates in defScreen of the invisible buttons
        • posX
          List<Integer> posX
          X real coordinates of the invisible buttons
        • posY
          List<Integer> posY
          Y real coordinates of the invisible buttons
        • skyscrapers
          BufferedImage skyscrapers
          Panel skyscrapers image
        • standardHeightChar
          int standardHeightChar
          Standard height of an option character
        • standardWidthChar
          int standardWidthChar
          Standard width of an option character
        • vocabo
          Vocabulary vocabo
          It dispenses symbols and letters sprites in a game-like fashion style
        • yOptions
          int[] yOptions
          Multiplication factors for calculating the options Y coordinates. They will be multiplied by the real height unit of the frame for options drawing.
